SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.easetech.easytest.annotation
Annotation Type Converters

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={METHOD,TYPE})
public @interface Converters

Annotation to be used for declaring the converters on a test Class See Converter for more details on what Converters are and how can they be used.

Author:
Anuj Kumar

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.Class<? extends Converter>[] value
          An array of Converter classes to be registered with the EasyTest framework
 

Element Detail

value

public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends Converter>[] value
An array of Converter classes to be registered with the EasyTest framework

Returns:
an array of Converters
